description.japanese: フロロを撃破した

description.english: Defeat the mad Demiurges in Divine Courtroom

description.tchinese: 擊敗審判庭內瘋狂的德慕格

description.french: Le doute engendre la vraie raison

description.spanish: Haz que Benita te bendiga

description.english: Complete the 4th Journey or above without using the Egg of the Bearer
description.german: Schließe die 4. Reise (oder höher) ab, ohne das Ei des Trägers zu benutzen.

description.koreana: 짐 진 자의 알을 사용하지 않고 4라운드 게임 또는 임의의 다음 라운드 게임을 완료합니다.
description.spanish: Completa cuatro odiseas, como mínimo, sin usar el huevo del portador

description.tchinese: 不使用負重者之卵的情況下，完成第四周目或者之后的某一周目

displayName.italian: L'eroe che ha smarrito la via

description.spanish: Derrota a Handel, el duque

description.spanish: Derrota a Guderian, el guardián
description.japanese: ガーディアン・グデーリアンを倒す

description.spanish: Derrota a los ladrones de tesoros
description.japanese: 宝泥棒を倒す

description.english: Discover the ancient memories buried deep in Ichthyosauria
description.german: Entdecke die uralten Erinnerungen, die tief in Ichthyosauria vergraben sind
description.french: Découvrez les mémoires anciennes enterrées dans Ichthyosauria
description.italian: Scopri gli antichi ricordi sepolti nell'Ichthyosauria
description.koreana: 이크티오사우리아 깊은 곳에 넣어둔 고대의 기억 모두 발견
description.spanish: Descubre los recuerdos antiguos de las profundidades de Ictiosauria
description.schinese: 发现所有埋藏在伊西索亚深处的上古记忆
description.tchinese: 發現所有埋藏在伊西索亞深處的上古記憶
description.russian: Отыщите древние воспоминания, погребенные в Ихтиозаврии
description.japanese: イシソーヤの深くに埋められた全ての上古の記憶を発見する
description.brazilian: Descubra as memórias antigas enterradas nas profundezas de Ictiosauria

description.english: Find the fate of Bravo's soul
description.german: Entdecke das Schicksal von Bravos Seele
description.french: Découvrez le destin de l'âme de Bravo
description.italian: Scopri il destino dell'anima di Bravo
description.spanish: Descubre el destino del alma de Bravo
description.schinese: 帮助布沃尔找到最终的归处
description.tchinese: 幫助布沃爾找到最終的歸處
description.japanese: ブラボーのために最後の地を探す
description.brazilian: Descubra o destino da alma de Bravo

description.english: Breach the Wall of Silence and make Soul River flow again
description.german: Durchbrich die Mauer des Schweigens und lass den Seelenfluss wieder fließen
description.french: Brisez le mur de Silence et faites couler la rivière des Âmes à nouveau
description.italian: Apri un varco nel Muro del silenzio e fai scorrere il Fiume delle anime
description.koreana: 침묵의 벽을 열고 침전의 강 물줄기 되돌리기
description.spanish: Atraviesa el Muro del Silencio y haz que el río del Alma vuelva a fluir
description.schinese: 打开静默之墙，让浸灵河恢复奔流
description.tchinese: 打開靜默之牆，讓浸靈河恢復奔流
description.russian: Проломите стену тишины и дайте волю Реке Душ
description.japanese: 沈黙の壁を開き、浸霊川の流れを回復する
description.brazilian: Quebre a Muralha do Silêncio e faça o Rio das Almas fluir novamente

description.english: Find the answer you've been seeking at the end of the journey.
description.german: Finde die Antwort, die du suchst, am Ende deiner Reise.
description.french: Trouvez la réponse que vous cherchiez à la fin de l'aventure.
description.italian: Trova la risposta che stai cercando alla fine del viaggio.
description.spanish: Halla la respuesta que has estado buscando al final de la odisea
description.schinese: 在旅程的最后找到一直追寻的答案
description.tchinese: 在旅程的最後找到一直追尋的答案
description.russian: Найдите ответ, который вы жаждите получить, в конце путешествия.
description.japanese: 旅の最後にずっと追い求めてきた答えを見つける
description.brazilian: Encontre a resposta que você tem procurado no final da jornada.

description.english: Activate every max talent of Jerold
description.german: Aktiviere jedes max. Talent von Jerold
description.french: Activez chaque talent de Jerold au maximum
description.italian: Potenzia al massimo i talenti di Jerold
description.koreana: 제롤드의 모든 재능 최고 레벨 활성화
description.spanish: Sube el nivel de todos los dones de Jerold al máximo
description.schinese: 激活杰洛尔德所有天赋的最高等级
description.tchinese: 活化傑洛爾德所有天賦的最高等級
description.japanese: ジェロルドの全ての天賦を最高レベルまで解放する
description.brazilian: Ative todos os talentos máximos de Jerold

description.english: Find all the Siflers in Ichthyosauria
description.italian: Trova tutti i Sifler di Ichthyosauria
description.spanish: Encuentra a todos los sifleros de Ictiosauria
description.schinese: 找到伊西索亚的所有黑精
description.tchinese: 找到伊西索亞的所有黑精
description.japanese: イシソーヤの全てのシフラーを見つける
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os ululantes em Ictiosauria

description.english: Ingratiate yourself with the Heggie of Ichthyosauria and obtain the key to the doors of the treasury
description.german: Schmeichele dich beim Heggie von Ichthyosauria ein und erhalte den Schlüssel für die Tür zur Schatzkammer
description.french: Attirez-vous les faveurs des Heggies d'Ichthyosauria et obtenez la clé de la porte du trésor
description.italian: Ingraziati gli Heggie di Ichthyosauria e ottieni la chiave per la porta della camera del tesoro
description.koreana: 이크티오사우리아의 모든 하키를 기쁘게 하여 보고의 열쇠를 받았다.
description.spanish: Congráciate con los Heggie de Ictiosauria y obtén la llave que abre la puerta de la tesorería.
description.schinese: 取悦伊西索亚所有的赫吉，获赐宝库大门的钥匙
description.tchinese: 取悅伊西索亞所有的赫吉，獲賜寶庫大門的鑰匙
description.russian: Снискайте расположение Квакуна Ихтиозаврии и получите ключ от двери сокровищницы.
description.japanese: イシソーヤの全てのヘギに気に入られると、宝物庫の扉の鍵が授けられる。
description.brazilian: Aliene o heggie de Ictiosauria e obtenha a chave para a porta da tesouraria

description.english: In any mode of Obsession Challenge, defeat all the Obsessed Ones in the main story without getting injured.
description.german: Besiege in einem beliebigen Modus der Obsession-Herausforderung alle Besessenen der Hauptgeschichte, ohne verletzt zu werden.
description.french: Dans n'importe quel mode du défi Obsession, éliminez tous les adversaires obsédés de l'intrigue principale sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: In qualsiasi modalità della Sfida ossessione, sconfiggi tutti gli Ossessi nella storia principale senza farti ferire.
description.koreana: [원념 도전] 모드 관계없이 상처 없이 본편의 모든 강대한 원념자 처치
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los obsesionados de la historia principal sin recibir daños en cualquier modo del desafío de obsesión.
description.schinese: 在「挑战执念」的任意模式中无伤击败所有本篇的强大执念者
description.tchinese: 在「挑戰執念」的任意模式中無傷擊敗所有本篇的強大執念者
description.russian: В любом режиме испытания одержимости победите всех Одержимых в основной истории, не получив урона.
description.japanese: 「執念・チャレンジ」の任意のモードで、本編の全ての強大執念者を無傷で撃破
description.brazilian: Em qualquer modo do Desafio Obsessivo, derrote todos os Obcecados na história principal sem receber dano.

description.english: In the Standard Mode of Obsession Challenge, defeat all the Obsessed Ones in the main story.
description.german: Besiege im Standardmodus der Obsession-Herausforderung alle Besessenen der Hauptgeschichte.
description.french: Dans le mode normal du défi Obsession, éliminez tous les adversaires obsédés de l'intrigue principale.
description.italian: Nella mod. Standard della Sfida ossessione, sconfiggi tutti gli Ossessi nella storia principale.
description.koreana: [원념 도전] 일반 모드에서 본편의 모든 강대한 원념자 처치
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los obsesionados de la historia principal en el modo estándar del desafío de obsesión.
description.schinese: 在「挑战执念」的标准模式中击败所有本篇的强大执念者
description.tchinese: 在「挑戰執念」的標準模式中擊敗所有本篇的強大執念者
description.russian: В обычном режиме испытания одержимости победите всех Одержимых в основной истории.
description.japanese: 「執念・チャレンジ」のノーマルモードで、本編の全ての強大執念者を撃破
description.brazilian: No modo padrão do Desafio Obsessivo, derrote todos os Obcecados na história principal.

description.english: In the Custom Mode under Colossus Difficulty of Obsession Challenge, defeat all the Obsessed Ones in the main story.
description.schinese: 在「挑战执念」自选模式的巨像难度下击败所有本篇的强大执念者
description.tchinese: 在「挑戰執念」自選模式的巨像難度下擊敗所有本篇的強大執念者
description.japanese: 「執念・チャレンジ」フリーモードの巨像難易度で、本編の全ての強大執念者を撃破
description.koreana: [원념 도전] 자유 모드의 콜로서스 난이도에서 본편의 모든 강대한 원념자 처치
description.german: Besiege im benutzerdefinierten Modus (Schwierigkeit Gigant) der Obsession-Herausforderung alle Besessenen der Hauptgeschichte.
description.french: Dans le mode personnalisé avec la difficulté Colosse du défi Obsession, éliminez tous les adversaires obsédés de l'intrigue principale.
description.italian: In mod. Personale della Sfida ossessione a difficoltà Colosso, sconfiggi tutti gli Ossessi nella storia principale.
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los obsesionados de la historia principal en la dificultad «coloso» del modo personalizado del desafío de obsesión.
description.russian: В Своей игре в сложности «Колосс» испытания одержимости победите всех Одержимых в основной истории.
description.brazilian: No modo personalizado de dificuldade de colosso do Desafio Obsessivo, derrote todos os Obcecados na história principal.

description.english: In Obsession Challenge, defeat the First Messenger using any role but Terrence.
description.schinese: 在「挑战执念」中使用泰伦斯之外的任一角色击败第一信使
description.tchinese: 在「挑戰執念」中使用泰倫斯之外的任一角色擊敗第一信使
description.japanese: 「執念・チャレンジ」でテレンス以外の任意のキャラクターを使用して第一信使を撃破
description.koreana: [원념 도전]에서 테런스 외의 캐릭터로 첫 번째 메신저 처치
description.german: Besiege in der Obsession-Herausforderung den ersten Boten mit einem beliebigen Charakter (außer Terrence).
description.french: Dans le défi Obsession, éliminez le premier héraut avec n'importe quel personnage sauf Terrence.
description.italian: Nella Sfida ossessione, sconfiggi il primo Messaggero nei panni di chiunque tranne Terrence.
description.spanish: Derrota al primer mensajero usando solo a Terrence en el desafío de obsesión.
description.russian: В испытания одержимости победите Первого вестника, играя за любого персонажа кроме Терренса.
description.brazilian: No Desafio Obsessivo, derrote o Primeiro Mensageiro usando qualquer papel, menos Terrence.
